docs.text:
빗자루넷 따라하기


환경




macOS Sierra 10.12.1 


python-2.7 + virtualenvwrapper




준비


$ mkvirtualenv myevan_site

(
myevan_site
)
$ pip install mkdocs

(
myevan_site
)
$ pip install pygments

(
myevan_site
)
$ pip install pymdown-extensions

(
myevan_site
)
$ pip install mkdocs-material
docs.title: myevan site

docs.text: $ mkvirtualenv myevan_site ( myevan_site ) $ pip install mkdocs ( myevan_site ) $ pip install pygments ( myevan_site ) $ pip install pymdown-extensions ( myevan_site ) $ pip install mkdocs-material
docs.title: 준비
